name: Red Curry of Scallops (chuu chii hoi shenn)
recipeIngredient: 5-8 dried long red chilies (deseeded, soaked and drained),
1 tbsp scraped and chopped coriander root,
recipeInstructions: 2. Crack the coconut cream over medium heat, add 3 tbsp of the paste and fry, stirring regularly, for 5 minutes, until fragrant. Season with sugar and fish sauce.
3. Add coconut milk and simmer until reduced, quite thick, and separated.
4. Add scallops, and half the kaffir lime leaves and continue to simmer briefly, with the scallops immersed, until the flesh is just cooked.
5. Check seasoning: it should be salty, a little hot, and fragrant from the kaffir lime.
6. To serve, arrange the scallops on a plate, drizzle over the coconut cream, then sprinkle with the remaining lime leaves, red chilli and coriander.
